# [Interview #123: SciFi.com Chat, Entry #28](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=123#28)

#### Nevik

Can you give some more details on how the taint was cleansed? I was sort of confused reading the book.

#### Robert Jordan

Sorry...I can't.
